patthana15.47:1.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.47:2.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
